Title: Establishes a task force to be called the office of asylum management
Summary: Establishes a task force to be called the "office of asylum management" to study, evaluate, and develop recommendations relating to the management of asylum seekers in this state; requires reporting to the governor and the legislature.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to establishing a task force to be called the office of asylum management; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
